en.sc1: Let's look at how the enqueue operation works.
en.sc2: We will enqueue the the value 10. We call addLast() to add a node to the end of the list.
en.sc3: The addLast() method updates the ``next`` pointer of the current last node to point to the new node, and then updates the ``tail`` pointer to point to the new node.
en.sc4: We treat the head pointer as the front of the queue, and the tail pointer as the back of the queue, so the linked list operations map directly to the queue operations.
